page.title: 15A PRIMARY TEACHER IN BURWELL
page.content: Mrs Ratcliffe is{Acting Head of {Parsonage Close First School.}She began teaching in 1955 in Plymouth and has worked in Devon, Berkshire and two schools in Cambridge.The school is 20 years old and she has taught there for 15 years.As{her staff}she has 5 full- time teachers and 1 part-time,2 cooks,3 dinner ladies ,3 cleaners and a half time secretary. Her{school is closing}and the 166 children(58 boys and 58 girls) with some of the staff will be going to a {new Primary School}in September.This is being built{at the Village College which is now a Middle School.Instead of 5 to 9 year olds she will be teaching 5 to 11s who then go to Soham or Bottisham Village Colleges. No-one knows what will happen to the school when it is sold.
